nodes.text: The Moskk system was an Outer Rim Territories star system in the Albarrio sector, that was several sectors away from the Gwori system and had at least two planets and two moons. A Galactic Republic task force under the command of Jedi Generals Plo Koon and Saesee Tiin and Admiral Wullf Yularen used the system around 22 BBY as a staging area for an attack on Gwori and its InterGalactic Banking Clan shipyards.
